2097310.name: RPG Maker MZ - KR Steampunk Airship Tileset
2097310.description:
Fly high with this Steampunk Airship tileset for RPG Maker! Create a simple transport blimp or a complete armada!

The Steampunk Airship Tileset Includes:

Interior Ground Tiles:

Water (for flying shots)
Wood planks (one version with edges)
Several styles of grates, with and without edges
Gear edge for floors
Chains
Table
Rug
You also get gears and other edges for decorating!

Interior Walls:

Mechanical wall patterns
Aged metal
Metal panels
Hanging chains
And more!
Includes roof tiles that match the above flooring, so you can easily create tiered designs

Also includes:

Five sizes of balloon
Fin-shaped sails (with animations)
Propeller bases (4 sizes)
Chains
Hanging lantern
3 styles of gondola – sizes can be customized
Ship numbers
Portholes and other windows
Cannons
Bunk system with curtains, stairs, rails and cabinets
Seating
Luggage (with overhead rack)
Anchors
Hammock
Maps and globes
Ropes, chains and other accessories
Dining set
Other lighting
Big windows
Metal edging
Ship base, with raised areas, stairs, etc
Crates, barrels and boxes in different collections
Rat tails and ropes
Sky backgrounds (4 types)
and more!

Events and Animations

Several styles of doors, with light and dark interiors
Trunk that opens
Two types of sails
Multiple sizes and positions of propellers
Two types of valves, in both floor and wall perspective, in small and large sizes.

* Note: this set relies on lots of layers and may take a little patience to achieve your desired effect. For the best experience, we recommend taking the pieces into a graphics editor and building a complete airship there. All screenshots were taken from RPG Maker WITHOUT using a graphics editor.

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games
2097310.supported_languages: 英语, 日语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 俄语, 简体中文, 繁体中文, 韩语
